mapper.select: select member_no, member_email,member_name, member_nickName, member_position from show_member
select member_no, member_email, member_nickName, member_pass, member_phone, member_birth from show_member where member_no = #{member_no}
select member_no, member_email, member_name, member_position from show_member where member_name like '%'||#{member_name}||'%'
select qna_no,qna_name,qna_email,qna_title,qna_text,qna_category,qna_ch from show_qna where qna_ch = #{qna_ch} order by qna_no desc
